description:
This course teaches you how to create the perfect self hypnosis audio to become a negotiation master.

Close deals with ease.

Nurture and grow the negotiating skills you have hidden deep within you. Overcome any objections and always get the best possible deal.

You can always negotiate successfully and get what you want, anytime and anywhere.

Become a master negotiator in your sleep. Listen to the audio as you go to sleep over a period of 30 days and you'll notice the difference. The changes may be subtle at first, but when you look back, you'll see the amazing success you've had over the previous 30 days when you've needed to negotiate.

“You catch more flies with honey than you do with vinegar" is a phrase you may have heard. You'll learn to better “negotiate instead of interrogate" to achieve the success you deserve.

Whether it's getting someone to join you at the game or purchase the product you are selling, you'll be able to successfully negotiate and convince, influence and persuade anyone to get them to do what you want.
title: Negotiation Master: Close deals with ease
